description: This file is a JavaScript module acting as a service layer for handling recipe data fetching and mapping. It defines functions to retrieve recipes and a specific recipe by ID, utilizing imported HTTP client and mappers, currently with placeholder implementations.

methods.name: fetchRecipes(params = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of recipes, currently returning an empty array mapped through 'mapRecipeList'.

methods.name: fetchRecipeById(id)
methods.description: Fetches a single recipe by ID, returning a placeholder object mapped through 'mapRecipeDetail'.
